name: Balance It
description:
Welcome to the game “Balance It”, where you should hold the magic ball on the hovering island as long as possible and do not let it drop out. Drag your mouse horizontally to rotate the island. Press Esc or Space to pause the game.

Be careful! Falling rocks and meteorites will disturb you.

Good luck!

Team - div/null:

  • Optifun - Programmer
  • f1van - Game Designer, Programmer
  • Bobby16 - Game Designer, Artist(Art)
  • Nukeland - Artist(Animation)

Audio provided by freesound.org
